description:
New Course Published May 17, 2016 - Hi I’m Empowerment Expert Louise Anne Maurice and today I would like to help you become an Empowered Project Manager who knows precisely how to deal with lazy co-workers.

  1. Do you struggle with lazy people on your team who aren’t engaged or motivated to work?
  2. Do you fear that their lack of productivity will negatively impact you?
  3. Do you leave work every day feeling drained or stressed out from dealing with difficult people who constantly procrastinate?

Then You Are In the Right Place because my BRAND NEW COURSE is for you!

REALITY - Sometimes you have no control over selecting your team.  As a Project Manager, you usually walk into the unknown.

I have helped many Project Managers, just like you, feel competent working with a diverse, and sometimes unknown, Team.

With me as your guide, you will experience less stress and more confidence dealing with difficult team members

2 parts high-level training seminar and 3 parts hands-on workshop, I developed this course to be a $199 value

This course gives you part one of my GET RESULTS Soft Skills Training Program

By the end of this soft skills training course, you’ll know how to implement proven techniques plus much more.

I show you how to deal with lazy team members without sacrificing what you love to do – Manage Projects from start to finish  

The usual approach to developing a motivated team doesn’t work with certain team members

In this course I walk you through my two part in-depth Chain Reaction Framework for dealing with procrastinators 

I then show you exactly how to apply this framework to my motivation methods

My motivation methods work even with the toughest team members – you learn about the 2 most challenging.

This course is ideal if you want the simple blueprint and an easy step-by-step plan to follow

Plus you receive my empower formula to help you develop an engaged productive team.

As a bonus, you walk away with a 57 page manual to keep as your guide plus lifetime access to coaching and consulting – all from your one-time low course enrollment fee. 

Remember, this course is NO RISK - There is a 30 Day 100% MONEY BACK REFUND

Check out some of the FREE PREVIEWS available to learn more about how this course can turn you into a highly sought-after Project Manager.   

Then click on the “Take This Course” button and start learning instantly how to turn lazy team members into engaged productivity superstars.
title: Empowered Project Manager1: New Part 1 Soft Skills Training
